text: The East Lancs Myllennium Lowlander was a double-decker body of a bus. It had a low floor. It was built between 2000 to 2007 by East Lancashire Coachbuilders. It was only built on the DAF DB250 chassis. East Lancs misspelled bus names on purpose (naming it "Myllennium " instead of "Millennium ") ==Related pages== * For the single decker, see East Lancs Myllennium * For the double-deck body on Dennis Trident 2 chassis, see East Lancs Myllennium Lolyne * For the double-deck body on Volvo B7TL, see East Lancs Myllennium Vyking * For the double-deck body on Volvo B9TL, see East Lancs Myllennium Nordic ==References== ==Other websites== * Myllennium Lowlander Category:Low-floor buses Category:Double-decker buses
title: East Lancs Myllennium Lowlander
